defaultConfig.Name: temperature
defaultConfig.Description: OpenAI randomness. As the value approaches 0, the output becomes deterministic and repititive

defaultConfig.Name: maxlinesofchat
defaultConfig.Description: limit the conversation to the given line chat

defaultConfig.Name: terminationprompt
defaultConfig.Description: user prompt to be sent to direct ChatGPT to end conversation
defaultConfig.Value: Give a 1 line response and wind up this conversation

defaultConfig.Name: performance template
defaultConfig.Descriiption: Public URL of the prformance template image
